  • Method Details

    • registerVehicle

      public Optional<Vehicle> registerVehicle(String plateId, String brand, String model, int type, float tareWeight, float grossWeight, float currentKm, float checkUpFrequency, float lastCheckUp, Data registerDate, Data acquisitionDate)
      Registers a new vehicle in the repository.
      Parameters:
      plateId - The plate ID of the vehicle.
      brand - The brand of the vehicle.
      model - The model of the vehicle.
      type - The type of the vehicle.
      tareWeight - The tare weight of the vehicle.
      grossWeight - The gross weight of the vehicle.
      currentKm - The current kilometers of the vehicle.
      checkUpFrequency - The check-up frequency of the vehicle.
      lastCheckUp - The date of the last check-up of the vehicle.
      registerDate - The registration date of the vehicle.
      acquisitionDate - The acquisition date of the vehicle.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the registered Vehicle if successful, otherwise empty.
